import React from 'react'; import { MapPin, Navigation, Search, Sparkles } from 'lucide-react'; import { SearchBarProps } from '../types'; const SearchBar: React.FC = ({ origin, destination, onOriginChange, onDestinationChange, onSearch, loading }) => { return (
onOriginChange(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your starting location" className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-4 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-100 focus:border-primary-500 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm transition-all duration-200 text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-500 font-medium" />
onDestinationChange(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your destination" className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-4 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-100 focus:border-primary-500 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm transition-all duration-200 text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-500 font-medium" />
{origin && destination && !loading && (
Ready to discover photo-worthy routes!
)}
); }; export default SearchBar;
